item.title: Anna Kendrick - True Colors - Key of G
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play True Colors on the ukulele by Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake. The chords used are G C D Em B7. Original in Key E.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Anna Kendrick - True Colors - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play True Colors on the ukulele by Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake. The chords used are C F G Am E7. Original Key is E.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Justin Timberlake - Say Something - Key of Am
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. In the key of Am (lowered a minor third), to make the song more ukulele friendly.
As performed by Justin Timberlake and Chris Stapleton.
Thanks to Katie Wardrobe, from Midnight Music (www.midnightmusic.com.au) for suggesting this song.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Justin Timberlake - Say Something - Key of Cm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. In the original key of Cm.
As performed by Justin Timberlake and Chris Stapleton.
Thanks to Katie Wardrobe, from Midnight Music (www.midnightmusic.com.au) for suggesting this song.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Justin Timberlake - Say Something - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. In the key of Am (lowered a minor third), to make the song more ukulele friendly. Most guitar websites show this song in Am, requesting the player to use a capo (this video does not require a capo).
As performed by Justin Timberlake and Chris Stapleton.
Thanks to Katie Wardrobe, from Midnight Music (www.midnightmusic.com.au) for suggesting this song.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Baritone Ukulele, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Justin Timberlake - CAN'T STOP THE FEELING! - Key of F
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Can’t Stop The Feeling on the ukulele by Justin Timberlake. The chords used are C F Am Bb Ab Fm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Justin Timberlake - Can't Stop The Feeling - Key of F
item.description: Can't Stop The Feeling Justin Timberlake C Am F Bb
